Articles.Content:
Salutations all from the Great White North! i.e., Canada.

I downloaded this 'game' about a week ago and am as one would say 'addicted' to it.

I enjoy reading the forums and enjoy even more sending my Kermens into space.. with as few explosions as possible, though I think I may have depleted a few thousand Kermens so far... on the plus side, my rockets have greatly improved and have hit my personal mile-stone of 'no return' trips... ie, over 10km/s @ 50,000KM and still going.. and gradually increasing speed.

Hi, my name is Stray; and Iâ€™m addicted to KSP.

Welcome to the forums, and the community.

I hope you enjoy your time here, and you will find many many people with the same affliction as you on these forums

Hope you enjoy your stay.

-Stray.

Kevin, this post is from last JULY. Please do not necro post, especially Welcome Aboard threads.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
